title: Cameo Night Club
desc: The Sexiest and most sought after Weekly Promotion will arrive in 2016 !!!!? The Cameo promotion team is the one that started it all and made going out the thing to do for the young and sexy 18 & over college party people. Others tried to duplicate but none have ever been as successful.. Join the Celebration every Friday night starting Friday February 12th 2016 Doors Open 9pm-2am Instagram : @Cameo_HW ??????????????????????? Inside Hollywood's Most Intimate & Luxurious Venue? 1775 Ivar Ave Hollywood CA? Featuring - 2 Rooms / 700 Capacity Venue ??????????????????????? MixMaster of Night!!! Marc P of Cal State University Northridge ?????????????????????? Bottle Special's 1 Captain Morgan Bottle = $250 1 Absolute Vodka Bottle =? $250 1 Grey Goose Bottle =? $250 1 Ciroc Bottle =? $250 ??????????????????????? Dress Code will be enforced! We will be filming and taking pictures all night so dress accordingly ;) We are looking for self motivated entrepreneurs & open format djs to join our promotion team. If you are interested please send us an email.
